name: Phoenix Strikers
description:
Thank you for the music Subspace Audio, you can find his music at opengameart.org and also website: https://juhanijunkala.com/

I used some other assets for the alien spaceships. Sadly I'm not fully sure who they are created by (Had computer problems and lost the files and it's been a long time) if your assets are being used let me know and I'll be happy to credit you for those. 

This was a project that was created using the help from Udemy you can find that tutorial at website: https://www.udemy.com/share/101WjsB0QfcFlaTHU=/ 

Description:

Phoenix Strikers is about an elite group of pilots know as the Phoenix Squadron that is the first in line to defeat the aliens trying to destroy the plant Terran.
